# About
This vignette is intended to provide additional information for R users 
interested in learning more about developing, testing, releasing, and documenting 
their own R packages at DBHDS and beyond. Where feasible, annotations are 
provided to guide readers to the best source of information for particular topics.

# R Package Development
The following resources offer additional insight into the development of R 
packages -- also referred to as **R extensions**.
